COOL RAILS - Github

Cool Rails projects I come across on the web each week.



This week my pick is Github from Github,Inc1

While I’m sure most of you know what github is and does, a little rehash for those who don’t … Github is a repsotory powered by Git2, with some other cool tools.

While not new by any means


The Tech:

  1. Github was originally started by Tom Preston-Werner, Chris Wanstrath, and PJ Hyett. ↩

  2. Not to be confused with Git the version control cli tool. For a little better explination see this great post ‘Is Git the Same Thing as Github!?’ by Andrew McWilliams. ↩
